article.title: Lockheed to Modernize Laser Range Finder Designators
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Missiles and Fire Control, Orlando, Florida, was awarded a $33,110,240 firm-fixed-price contract modification to modernize laser range finder designators. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
